name: behind bars. demo v1.2
description:
you've been a prisoner here for a while, but something is wrong today- all your fellow inmates have vanished

controls.

just click (on white squares and items)

credits.

created by gevillydev
tested by landon m. and lena b.

this is the final update for demo v1. this is the full update list.

- demo v1 (1/4/2023) : this is just a proof of concept to get initial feedback, not a full demo
- demo v1.1 (1/5/2023) : fix bug where door sound is spammable and bug where you could glitch items and buttons from one room to another
- demo v1.2 (1/8/2023) - fix bug where sounds don't play unless you enter and exit the bathroom
